publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6580.2 Margaret Smith: Schools—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6580) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end ", and notes that the Scottish Government’s package of education failures includes the abandonment of SNP election commitments to reduce class sizes in P1 to P3 to 18, dump student debt and match brick for brick the previous administration’s school building programme."
